sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import './Home.css'; // Make sure to create a CSS file for styling const Home = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [filter, setFilter] = useState('All'); // State for filters const [expandedSections, setExpandedSections] = useState({ idealFor: false, occasion: false, work: false, fabric: false, segment: false, suitableFor: false, rawMaterials: false, pattern: false, }); useEffect(() => { // Fetching products using Axios axios.get('https://fakestoreapi.com/products') .then(response => setProducts(response.data)) .catch(error => console.log(error)); }, []); const toggleSection = (section) => { setExpandedSections({ ...expandedSections, [section]: !expandedSections[section], }); }; const filteredProducts = filter === 'All' ? products : products.filter(product => product.category === filter); return (

Customizable

toggleSection('idealFor')}> Ideal For
All

toggleSection('occasion')}> Occasion

toggleSection('fabric')}> Fabric

toggleSection('segment')}> Segment

toggleSection('suitableFor')}> Suitable For

toggleSection('rawMaterials')}> Raw Materials

toggleSection('pattern')}> Pattern

{product.title}

${product.price}

))}
); }; export default Home;
